metadata.description: DevOps engineer specializing in infrastructure, deployment, and system reliability

skills.name: Linux & Command Line
skills.description: System administration, shell commands, file systems, process management

skills.name: Networking & TCP/IP
skills.description: OSI model, DNS, load balancing, firewalls, network troubleshooting

skills.name: Docker & Containerization
skills.description: Container creation, multi-stage builds, volumes, networking, best practices

skills.name: Kubernetes Orchestration
skills.description: Container orchestration, cluster management, scaling strategies, deployments

skills.name: Cloud Platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure)
skills.description: Cloud services, compute, storage, networking, cost optimization

skills.name: Infrastructure as Code
skills.description: Terraform, CloudFormation, declarative infrastructure, state management

skills.name: CI/CD Pipelines
skills.description: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, automated testing, deployment automation

skills.name: Monitoring & Observability
skills.description: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, metrics, logging, alerting

skills.name: Security & Access Control
skills.description: RBAC, secrets management, SSL/TLS, security hardening, compliance

skills.name: Database Administration
skills.description: Database backups, replication, performance tuning, high availability

skills.name: Scripting (Bash, Python)
skills.description: Automation scripts, system utilities, API integrations, task scheduling

skills.name: Problem Solving & System Design
skills.description: Infrastructure design, scalability, reliability, disaster recovery

tabs.name: High Growth Startups
tabs.description: Wear many hats, build infrastructure from scratch

interviewPrep.title: Interview Preparation
interviewPrep.description: DevOps interviews focus on infrastructure design, problem-solving, and reliability thinking
interviewPrep.overallStrategy: Show you can design reliable, scalable infrastructure. Demonstrate deep Linux knowledge, container expertise, and system design thinking. Emphasize reliability and automation.

prepTips: Be ready to discuss your infrastructure projects
Explain your Linux and containerization experience
Show understanding of DevOps principles
Ask about their infrastructure stack

interviewRounds.focus: Linux command line and scripting abilities
prepTips: Master Linux command line tools deeply
Practice bash and Python scripting
Understand file systems, permissions, and processes
Know troubleshooting and debugging commands
Show problem-solving approach
Clarify requirements, scale, and constraints
Design end-to-end infrastructure
Discuss containerization and orchestration
Consider high availability and disaster recovery
Show awareness of cost and security

interviewRounds.focus: Infrastructure as Code and automation tools
prepTips: Be comfortable with Terraform or CloudFormation
Show experience with CI/CD tools
Discuss configuration management approaches
Explain your approach to infrastructure reliability
Show understanding of monitoring and observability
commonTopics: CI/CD pipeline tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, etc.)

prepTips: Prepare stories about production incidents and learnings
Have examples of improving reliability or performance
Show how you communicate with engineers
Discuss on-call experience and incident response
Be authentic about your growth in DevOps
commonTopics: Tell us about a production incident and how you resolved it
How do you approach automation and reliability?
Your approach to monitoring and alerting
How you collaborate with engineering teams

recommendedProjects.title: Build Real-World Projects
recommendedProjects.description: Infrastructure and automation projects demonstrating DevOps expertise

projects.name: Containerize an Application
projects.description: Package an existing app in Docker with best practices
projects.whyValuable: Shows foundational Docker and containerization knowledge

projects.name: Basic Kubernetes Setup
projects.description: Deploy a containerized app to a local Kubernetes cluster
projects.whyValuable: Demonstrates Kubernetes fundamentals and deployment skills

projects.name: Simple CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Create an automated build and deploy pipeline
projects.whyValuable: Shows understanding of automation and CI/CD concepts

projects.name: Multi-Tier Infrastructure
projects.description: Design and deploy a complete multi-tier application infrastructure
projects.whyValuable: Shows ability to architect production-grade infrastructure

projects.name: Monitoring & Observability System
projects.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring, logging, and alerting
projects.whyValuable: Demonstrates production operations and reliability thinking

projects.name: Advanced CI/CD with IaC
projects.description: Build sophisticated CI/CD using Infrastructure as Code
projects.whyValuable: Shows maturity in automation and infrastructure management

projects.name: Production Kubernetes Cluster
projects.description: Design and manage a production-grade Kubernetes cluster

projects.name: Multi-Region Infrastructure
projects.description: Build distributed infrastructure across multiple regions
projects.whyValuable: Shows advanced infrastructure design for global scale

projects.name: Complete DevOps Platform
projects.description: Build end-to-end DevOps infrastructure with all components
projects.whyValuable: Demonstrates mastery of full DevOps lifecycle

successIndicators.title: How to Know You're Ready
successIndicators.description: Key milestones before applying to your target role

skillMap.title: Your Skill Map
skillMap.description: Compare your skills against the average DevOps Engineer

radarAxes.label: DSA
radarAxes.title: Problem-Solving & Scripting
radarAxes.description: Your ability to solve problems through scripting and automation. Important for DevOps automation and interviews.

radarAxes.label: Infrastructure Design
radarAxes.title: Infrastructure & Cloud Design
radarAxes.description: Your ability to design scalable, reliable infrastructure on cloud platforms. Critical for production systems at scale.

radarAxes.label: Projects
radarAxes.title: Project Experience
radarAxes.description: Your hands-on experience managing infrastructure and deployments. Demonstrates practical DevOps knowledge.

radarAxes.label: Languages
radarAxes.title: Scripting Languages
radarAxes.description: Your proficiency in Bash, Python, Go, and other scripting languages. The foundation of DevOps automation.

radarAxes.label: Monitoring
radarAxes.title: Monitoring & Observability
radarAxes.description: Your knowledge of logging, metrics, tracing, and alerting. Essential for maintaining system reliability.

tech.label: DSA
tech.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
tech.description: Your proficiency in solving coding problems and scripting. Important for automation and DevOps tooling.

tech.label: Infrastructure Design
tech.title: Infrastructure Design
tech.description: Your ability to design scalable cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment architectures. Critical for DevOps roles.

tech.label: Projects
tech.title: Project Experience
tech.description: Your hands-on experience building real-world infrastructure and automation projects. Demonstrates practical DevOps knowledge.

tech.label: Languages
tech.title: DevOps Languages
tech.description: Your proficiency in scripting and programming languages like Python, Go, Bash, etc. Essential for automation.

tech.label: Cloud Platforms
tech.title: Cloud & Container Platforms
tech.description: Your knowledge of AWS, GCP, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure. Fundamental for modern DevOps.

nonTech.label: DSA
nonTech.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
nonTech.description: Your foundational coding ability for scripting and automation.

nonTech.label: Fundamentals
nonTech.title: DevOps Fundamentals
nonTech.description: Your grasp of core DevOps concepts like deployment, infrastructure, and automation. Foundation for career growth.

nonTech.label: Projects
nonTech.title: Project Experience
nonTech.description: Real-world infrastructure projects you've built. Shows practical application of DevOps concepts.

nonTech.label: Languages
nonTech.title: DevOps Languages
nonTech.description: Your proficiency in scripting and programming for DevOps automation.

nonTech.label: Cloud Platforms
nonTech.title: Cloud & Container Platforms
nonTech.description: Your knowledge of cloud platforms and containerization technologies.
